jp_text: 分かりやすかった

en_text: I can solve the problems easily.
jp_text: 問題は解ける
google_translated: I can not understand the problem

en_text: However, it did not seem like I would\Nbe able to explain the process sufficiently.
jp_text:
でも 当てられて説明することが
できそうになかったから―
google_translated:
But it will be explained and explained
Because I was not able to do-

en_text: Oh, I see.
jp_text: （朝倉）ああ…

en_text: Don't tell me, that's why she was up so late?
jp_text:
（朝倉）まさか
それで寝るのが遅くなって…

en_text: but she's really trying her\Nhardest to be Nagato Yuki.
jp_text:
長門有希であろうと
本当に頑張ってるのね
google_translated:
It would be nice to
I'm really working hard

en_text: Just like this morning, I would have\Nmade more for you if you asked.
jp_text:
朝もそうですけど
言ってくれれば多めに用意するから
google_translated:
It is true in the morning
Because it is prepared to be a lot if you say

en_text: Um... That's not it.
jp_text: えっと そうじゃない

en_text: I was too embarrassed.
jp_text: 恥ずかしかったから

en_text: Wha–!? H-huh!? I-I'm sorry!...
jp_text:
（朝倉）んなっ！　わ…　えっ？
ご… ごめんなさい

en_text: I don't get it at all!
jp_text: 駄目だ　さーっぱり分からん

en_text: Studying?
jp_text: （長門）勉強？

en_text: Let me see.
jp_text: （キョン）テスト近いからな

en_text: Sure.
jp_text: （長門）見せて

en_text: Oh, wow!
jp_text: おお すごいな！

en_text: Well then, what about this one?
jp_text: じゃあ こっちは？

en_text: Okay then, how about this?
jp_text:
（キョン）おお！
じゃあじゃあ こっちは どうだ？
google_translated:
Oh!
Well then, how is he?

en_text: Start here...
jp_text:
（長門）ここを…
（キョン）おお…

en_text: This is perfect.
jp_text: フッフッフ　これはいいぞ

en_text: I won't have to beg for Asakura's help\Nwhile she looks down at me in disgust.
jp_text:
朝倉に嫌な顔されながら
頭を下げる必要もなくなる
google_translated:
While being disgusted by Asakura
There is no need to lower the head

en_text: Oh, you're still here?
jp_text: あら まだ残っていたんですか？

en_text: You should have heard\Nabout it in homeroom.
jp_text: 頼ってもらえるのは悪くない
google_translated: It is not bad to ask you

en_text: Did you know?
jp_text: 知ってたか？

en_text: I was reading a book during homeroom.
jp_text:
知らない
ホームルームは本を読んでいた
google_translated:
Do not know
Home Room was reading a book

en_text: I was just zoned out...
jp_text:
（キョン）
俺はボーッとしてたからなあ

en_text: Her head was filled with thoughts\Nof shopping on the way home.
jp_text:
（長門）帰り道は
買い物のことで頭がいっぱい
google_translated:
The way back
There are a lot of heads about shopping

en_text: I had a bunch of questions left to ask.
jp_text:
しっかし まいった
まだ聞きたいことあったんだけど
google_translated:
It was crazy
I still had something I wanted to hear

en_text: It's a pain not to be able\Nto use the club room.
jp_text: 部室 使えないのはイタいな
google_translated: It is good that it can not be used department room

en_text: Our promise...
jp_text: （長門）約束…

en_text: Promise?
jp_text: （キョン）約束？

en_text: You promised we could visit the library.
jp_text: 図書館に行く約束
google_translated: Promise to go to the library

en_text: Shall we go? Right now.
jp_text: 行く？　今から

en_text: All right, let's go!
jp_text: ちょうどいいし よし 行こう

en_text: Next time: "The Disappearance of Nagato Yuki-chan II"
jp_text: （長門）次回…
